description: Ever thought about running a business and wondering how to get help along the way? Our course, "Find & Assemble an Advisory Board" will teach you how tap into industry experts as you build your company. An advisory board is there to hold you accountable, give timely advice and help you grow your business. This course has over 12 videos and topics, bi-weekly office hours and provides the ability to ask questions with your classmates.  Sign up for our course today and join the hundreds that have been satisfied in our 'School of Raising Money' series!
title: Assemble an A+ Advisory Board
